2DO.F.summary: La Doria S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and markets food products in Italy, the United Kingdom, Japan, Australia and internationally. Its products include tomato-based products, fruit juices and beverages, vegetables, canned pasta, cooked pulses, baked beans, canned pulses, ready-made sauces, and carrots. The company sells its products under the La Doria, La Romanella, Vivi G, Cook Italia, Althea, and Bella Parma brand names through retailers and distribution chains. La Doria S.p.A. was founded in 1954 and is based in Angri, Italy.

6NF.F.summary: Newlat Food S.p.A. operates in the agri-food sector in Italy and internationally. The company offers pasta, rusks, toast, milk, yogurt, butter, cheese, protein and gluten free products, and childhood products. It offers its products under the 3 GLOCKEN, ala, Birkel, Buitoni, Centrale del Latte, CICCARESE, Corticella, DELVERDE, Fior di Salento, Giglio, Guacci, GÃDO, Krokkis, Matese, Optimus, Pezzullo, Polenghi, and Torre in Pietra brands through direct deposits and dealers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Reggio Emilia, Italy.

CLI.MI.summary: Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. produces and markets dairy products in Italy. The company offers fresh milk, high temperature pasteurized milk, long-life milk, cream, and yogurt. It also provides vegetable drinks, soy products, cheese, pasta, eggs, fresh salads, cured meat, kitchen-line products, desserts, and gluten-free products. The company was formerly known as Centrale del Latte di Torino & C. S.p.A. Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. was founded in 1950 and is based in Turin, Italy. As of July 30, 2020, Centrale del Latte d'Italia S.p.A. operates as subsidiary of Newlat Group S.A.

ENV.MI.summary: Enervit S.p.A. engages in the research, development, production, marketing, and export of sports food supplements and functional nutrition products in Italy. The company offers Enervit Sport, a line of food supplements for people practicing sports, as well as for muscle efficiency and recovery during and after exercise; EnerZona, a line of products primarily for mental and physical wellbeing; Enervit Protein that is used for health and diet products; and Enervit Gymline Muscle, a line of products for training athletes to develop muscles. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

ESI.MI.summary: ESI S.p.A. engages in the renewable energy business primarily in Italy. The company's business covers engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as system integration activities. It focuses on various market segments, such as photovoltaic, off-grid, mini-grid, hybrid, and storage systems, as well as wind power plants. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Formello, Italy.

ITM.MI.summary: Italmobiliare S.p.A., an investment holding company, owns and manages a portfolio of equity and other investments in the financial and industrial sectors in Italy and internationally. The company develops and produces fresh food packaging products, such as rigid containers, PET, and polypropylene for various food applications; and provides various trading products comprising films, containers, machineries, and accessories for fresh food industry and retail applications. It also produces and distributes electricity through renewable sources. The company has 15 hydropower plants; and approximately 300 kilometers of transmission lines in Italy, as well as 2 wind farms with a total capacity of 18 MW in Bulgaria. It also manufactures and sells coffee capsules and pods through specialist shops, as well as online and mass merchandising channels. In addition, the company manages private equity funds; and manufactures and sells outdoor footwear and ski equipment under the Tecnica, Blizzard, Lowa, Moon Boot, Rollerblade, and Nordica brand names. Further, it designs, manufactures, and distributes locks; cylinders; padlocks; and related security and safety equipment, such as emergency exits devices and door closers. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and sale of LPG; and real estate business. Italmobiliare S.p.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

VLS.MI.summary: Valsoia S.p.A produces, distributes, and markets mass consumption food products with a focus on health foods in Italy. It provides soya-based alternatives to drinks, ice creams, yogurts, desserts, biscuits, ready-meal dishes, cheeses and condiments, preserves and fruit products, and tomato purees and sauces, as well as wheat cereals and dietary supplement products. The company offers its products under the Valsoia BontÃ  E Salute, Naturattiva, Vitasoya, Santa Rosa, Pomodorissimo, Diete.Tic, BlueNyx, and Weetabix brands. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bologna, Italy. Valsoia S.p.A is a subsidiary of Finsalute S.r.l.
